text: Siberia is Polvo's sixth and final studio album. It was released on Merge Records on September 30, 2013. Unlike its predecessor, 2009's In Prism, the album was not accompanied with a tour. An official music video was created for the track "Light, Raking."https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dMa4-d3JW-8 ==Track listing== #"Total Immersion" - 6:26 #"Blues is Loss" - 6:52 #"Light, Raking" - 4:31 #"Changed" - 3:24 #"The Water Wheel" - 7:57 #"Old Maps" - 4:11 #"Some Songs" - 5:32 #"Anchoress" - 6:12 ==References== Category:Polvo albums Category:2013 albums
title: Siberia (Polvo album)
